title_display: Pipa : the magazine for Chinese speaking kids in North America.
title_t: Pipa : the magazine for Chinese speaking kids in North America.
title_citation_display: Pipa : the magazine for Chinese speaking kids in North America
compiled_created_t: Pipa : the magazine for Chinese speaking kids in North America.
pub_created_display: Plano, TX : Noble Tree Publishing, Inc., 2013-
pub_created_s: Plano, TX : Noble Tree Publishing, Inc., 2013-
pub_citation_display: Plano, TX: Noble Tree Publishing, Inc
description_t: Vol. 1, no. 4 (Oct. 2013) erroneously marked as no. 3, July 2013.
First issue is called "试刊号," undated and lacking numbering.
Vol. 1, no. 2-4 also called "春季号," "夏季号," "秋季号"
notes_display: "The magazine for Chinese speaking kids all over the world"--cover of Vol. 2, no. 3 (May 2014)
Some Chinese characters are accompanied with pronunciation guide in Pinyin.
Princeton copy 1 Cotsen copy has editor-in-chief's autograph in the first issue.
The first issue of Volumes 2-4 is inserted with a red paper-cut of a horse, sheep, and monkey respectively, zodiac animals of the upcoming Chinese New Year.
numbering_pec_notes_display: Vol. 1, no. 4 (Oct. 2013) erroneously marked as no. 3, July 2013.
First issue is called "试刊号," undated and lacking numbering.
Vol. 1, no. 2-4 also called "春季号," "夏季号," "秋季号"
source_desc_notes_display: Description based on: [Volume 1, number 1] (2013); title from cover.
Latest issue consulted: Volume 3, number 1, issue no. 11 (January 2015).
language_display: Chiefly in Chinese, with some parallel English translations.
